channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 18 grammes pour tout retenir : SwitchBot s’attaque au marché de l’assistant vocal portable
item.description: Après l'échec cuisant du Humane AI Pin, on pensait le marché des "badges IA" mort et enterré. Mais SwitchBot n'est pas d'accord. Au CES 2026, ils dégainent le MindClip, un assistant vocal discret conçu pour être votre "second cerveau". La promesse est belle : transformer vos conversations en to-do lists. La réalité ? Elle dépendra de l'abonnement. ...

item.title: Everything announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is in full swing, with all manner of companies descending on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew are on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we're keeping tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung has already held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, while LG has shown o...

item.title: Historic LastPass breach enabling cryptocurrency theft, investigation reveals
item.description: Tens of millions of dollars are being stolen through cracked LastPass vaults.

item.title: I tested the RugOne Xever 7 Pro - a lightweight rugged phone with removeable battery that’s dragged down by its processor
item.description: The RugOne Xever 7 Pro is a lightweight, rugged design that uses swapable batteries to extend its operating life.

item.title: 281 trillions de couleurs ? Le chiffre totalement absurde (mais drôle) de la nouvelle lampe Govee
item.description: Vous trouviez qu'il manquait de l'intelligence artificielle dans votre plafonnier ? Non ? Govee l'a fait quand même. Le fabricant chinois profite du CES pour dévoiler sa nouvelle gamme, dont la Floor Lamp 3 et ses promesses colorimétriques absurdes. Mais le produit qui nous plaît, c'est peut-être ce faux puit de lumière ultra-lumineux.

item.title: Amazon is rolling out Alexa+ for the web so you can use its assistant without a dedicated device
item.description: You no longer need an Amazon device to summon Alexa since the AI assistant will be available on the Alexa.com website. Amazon will roll out the web client to its Alexa+ Early Access customers first, still featuring the company's new and improved AI assistant that was announced in February. The web model won't be much different from the existing Alexa+ that's already available on Echo devices, Fire TV and Fire tablets. However, instead of buying into the Amazon ecosystem, Early Access customers can use any web browser to get Alexa+'s help with everything from basic questions to complex tasks, l...

item.title: J.J. Abrams’ Mysterious Next Movie May Have Found Its Title
item.description: Plus, is it really time for next Doctor rumors on 'Doctor Who' already?

item.title: Bee has been busy since its acquisition by Amazon last year
item.description: Bee, the company behind an always-listening AI wearable that Amazon acquired last year, has announced new features in a status update. The device is designed to run in the background of daily life and captures conversations or thoughts spoken aloud. Recording can be started or stopped with the push of a button. Co-founder of Bee, Maria de Lourdes Zollo, says the company has shipped four major updates that will run on the existing Bee Pioneer hardware. The first is “Actions,” which connects Bee to a user's email and calendar and works to turn spoken commitments into actions. The company says th...

item.title: Ember Artline is Amazon's answer to Samsung's The Frame
item.description: Amazon just revealed the Ember Artline TV at CES 2026. This is a lifestyle TV that displays art, putting it in direct competition with Samsung's The Frame. The 4K QLED screen is extremely thin, at 1.5-inches, so it'll likely fit just about anywhere. It also features a glare-reducing matte screen that has been "designed to make your art and photos look great." The Artline integrates with Amazon Photos and offers access to 2,000 pieces of free art to display. For those worried about electricity usage, the TV includes proprietary technology that senses when someone has entered or left the room an...

item.title: Ces lunettes remplacent votre TV : XREAL dévoile les 1S au CES 2026 qui intègrent une compatibilité native avec la Switch 2
item.description: C'est devenu une tradition au CES : XREAL sort une nouvelle paire de lunettes. Cette année, place aux XREAL 1S. Ne cherchez pas la révolution, c'est une évolution chirurgicale : 1200p, plus de luminosité et une compatibilité native avec la Switch 2.

item.title: This egg-shaped gadget aims to demystify hormones… with pee
item.description: Your urine can tell you a lot about your reproductive health hormones. Unfortunately, at-home testing can be cumbersome, involving collecting samples that are then mailed out to labs. That's what health startup Mira is trying to simplify with its $249 Ultra4 Hormone Monitor. The pitch is to make highly accurate, readily available hormone testing for […]...

item.title: Amazon adds to the lifestyle TV landscape with the Ember Artline TV
item.description: Joining Samsung's The Frame, Hisense CanvasTV, TCL Nxtvision, and newly announced LG Gallery TV, is Amazon's very first art TV. The Amazon Ember Artline is a 4K edge-lit LED TV with a matte screen to reduce ambient light glare and is only 1.5 inches thick. At purchase, customers will be able to include their choice […]

item.title: The Alexa Plus website is now available to everyone in early access
item.description: Alexa Plus was already popping up online for some users earlier this month, and now it's officially available to everyone through an early access program. Anyone can go sign up at Alexa.com and start playing with the new web interface for Amazon's new AI chatbot. Alexa Plus was already available on all new Echo devices […]

item.title: Amazon Fire TV OS gets a much-needed revamp
item.description: Amazon Fire TV has been a bit long in the tooth for a while now. Its design isn't as intuitive to navigate as Google TV, Roku, or Apple TV, and its responsiveness is frustrating. I've found it to be the weak link in Amazon's portfolio for a while now, and the only major drawback to […]

item.title: Kwikset’s new Matter-over-Thread smart lock costs under $200
item.description: Kwikset announced a price and release date for its Aura Reach smart lock at CES 2026 this week. A more affordable Matter-over-Thread option compared to the excellent but expensive Halo Select, the Aura Reach is available now for $189. At just under $100 less than the Halo, you are sacrificing built-in Wi-Fi and an integrated […]

item.title: Lifx launches a smart mirror and a $30 dimmer switch that can control smart bulbs
item.description: Lifx, one of the original smart lighting brands, is launching a Matter-enabled smart mirror, its first US in-wall dimmer, and a cheaper line of bulbs and light strips starting at around $12. The company, which announced the new products at CES this week, says it plans to upgrade its entire current generation of devices to […]

item.title: Amazon revamps Fire TV, launches its own ‘Artline’ televisions with frames at CES
item.description: Fire TV's new interface focuses on your content and offers easier, speedier navigation, Amazon says.

item.title: Amazon’s AI assistant comes to the web with Alexa.com
item.description: Amazon is bringing Alexa+ to the web with a new Alexa.com site, expanding its AI assistant beyond devices and positioning it as a family-focused, agent-style chatbot.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Tuesday, January 6 (game #1443)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Tuesday, January 6 (game #940)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Tuesday, January 6 (game #674)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Amazon’s Ember Artline is its answer to Samsung’s Frame — with a focus on value and AI
item.description: Amazon is taking on Samsung’s Frame with the Ember Artline Fire TV, a lifestyle TV that combines art display with ambient AI features and a likely lower starting price that includes the frame in the box.

item.title: Amazon is redesigning its Fire TV UI for streaming sticks and TVs
item.description: Amazon is kicking off the new year by announcing a redesign of its Fire TV UI at CES 2026. The new UI is designed to make finding things to watch on the platform faster, while making it easier to access more of Fire TV's features straight from the home screen.On first blush, the biggest difference in the new Fire TV UI is that everything is rounder. Shows, movies and apps have rounded corners, and Amazon's changed the spacing in the interface to give everything more room to breathe. Tweaks to typography and color gradients also give the UI a more modern feel, and Amazon says it's rebuilt the c...

item.title: The culture solution CEOs are missing
item.description: Skills-based volunteering is catalyzing the workforce of the future.

item.title: Fini la prise de notes : ce boîtier « Français » de génie résume vos réunions avec ChatGPT, Claude et Gemini
item.description: En 2015, Facebook promettait un assistant humain nommé Moneypenny. Dix ans plus tard, le nom revient au CES 2026, mais chez Oxtak. C'est un dictaphone dopé aux stéroïdes et à l'IA qui promet de résumer votre vie pro.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Trifold Hands On: This Is the Phone-Tablet Hybrid You're Looking For
item.description: At CES 2026, we went hands-on with the three-panel Samsung tablet that folds up to the size of a (large) phone.

item.title: Plier le linge et vider le lave-vaisselle : SwitchBot nous vend du rêve avec son robot Onero H1
item.description: Vous avez vu la vidéo de démo du SwitchBot Onero H1 ? C'est impressionnant : il plie le linge, vide le lave-vaisselle, sert à manger. Trop beau pour être vrai ? Probablement.

item.title: NordVPN denies data breach after hackers claim Salesforce leak — here's everything we know so far
item.description: Reports have surfaced of a potential data breach involving NordVPN's Salesforce tools. Here is what the hackers are claiming, and why NordVPN says your data remains secure.

item.title: Une feuille OLED de 9 mm pour jouer en 165 Hz : LG n’a pas fait les choses à moitié
item.description: C'est probablement le téléviseur le plus impressionnant visuellement de ce CES 2026. La LG OLED evo W6 reprend le concept du « papier peint » abandonné en 2020. En gros, c'est un écran de 77 ou 83 pouces collé au mur, sans aucun câble visible, piloté par un boîtier sans fil.

item.title: Nvidia pourrait remettre en vente une de ses cartes graphiques les plus populaires
item.description: Cette bonne vieille RTX 3060 pourrait revenir dans les rayons des magasins d'électronique dans le courant du premier trimestre. Nvidia semble en effet préparer le retour de sa carte graphique toujours très populaire malgré son âge. Il faut dire que la situation actuelle au niveau de la RAM plaide en faveur de ce modèle.

item.title: La B&YOU Pure Fibre est désormais plus chère : l’offre vaut-elle toujours le coup ?
item.description: Bouygues Telecom l'avait annoncé et c'est chose faite. À partir du 5 janvier 2026, l'abonnement B&YOU Pure Fibre voit son tarif augmenter.

item.title: Personne n’en a besoin, tout le monde la veut : voici l’objet déco le plus cool du CES
item.description: Il faut qu'on parle de l'obsession de mettre de l'IA partout. Même dans une lampe. SwitchBot dévoile l'Obboto, un globe lumineux capable de générer des "animations d'ambiance contrôlées par l'IA". Au-delà du buzzword, c'est surtout un très joli afficheur pixel art qui pourrait bien faire de l'ombre au célèbre LaMetric Time.

item.title: Bientôt en Europe, le Tesla Model Y L à 6 places se découvre dans ces images inédites
item.description: Jusqu'ici réservée au marché chinois, le Tesla Model Y L dotée de six places devrait bientôt arriver en Europe, où il rejoindra la version Performance. L'occasion de découvrir les croquis des designers.

item.title: TCL 55A300 : -60 % pour ce TV QLED en forme de tableau, la meilleure alternative au The Frame de Samsung
item.description: Voilà une belle opportunité pour s’équiper d’une TV premium à prix cassé : le TCL 55A300W, un TV qui se fond dans le décor avec son design tableau et dont le prix devient nettement plus avantageux en passant de 1 305 euros à 539 euros seulement.

item.title: Ils sont bannis en France, ces 8 smartphones n’auraient jamais dû atterrir dans votre poche
item.description: L'ANFR vient de taper du poing sur la table. L'agence ordonne le retrait immédiat de huit smartphones du marché français. Entre des niveaux d'ondes qui dépassent les bornes et des appareils vendus sans aucune certification européenne.

item.title: Jackery lance un robot suiveur de soleil et une pergola photovoltaïque pour transformer votre jardin en centrale électrique
item.description: On pensait avoir tout vu en matière de batteries externes. Mais Jackery vient de dynamiter le CES 2026. Ici, ce n'est pas une simple station qu'on jette dans le coffre : la marque présente un robot autonome qui chasse le soleil et une pergola photovoltaïque pour votre jardin.

item.title: TCL dévoile sa nouvelle gamme de TV X11L avec technologie SQD-Mini LED jusqu’à 10 000 cd/m²
item.description: Le fabricant chinois TCL vient de révéler au CES 2026 son nouveau téléviseur haut de gamme X11L, équipé d'une technologie inédite baptisée SQD-Mini LED qui promet de repousser les limites de la qualité d'image. Avec une luminosité de 10 000 cd/m², une couverture complète de l'espace colorimétrique BT.2020 et jusqu'à 20 736 zones de gradation, ce modèle entend battre des records. ...

item.title: Microsoft supprime l’activation des licences de Windows et d’Office par téléphone
item.description: L’activation des licences du système d’exploitation de Microsoft et de sa suite bureautique par téléphone n’est plus possible. La firme de Redmond a mis son serveur vocal dédié hors service.

item.title: Perte de poids : Garmin lance une nouvelle fonction pour surveiller vos calories directement sur votre montre
item.description: Garmin a annoncé, en ce début janvier 2026, une nouvelle fonctionnalité liée aux conseils nutritionnels pour aider chacune et chacun à atteindre son poids de forme en fonction de leurs objectifs.

item.title: James Cameron’s ‘Avatar: Fire and Ash’ crosses the $1B mark at the box office
item.description: The sci-fi epic is Hollywood’s No. 1 movie for the third straight week. Hollywood kicked off 2026 with “Avatar: Fire and Ash” atop the box office for the third straight week and with hopes for a blockbuster-filled year after a disappointing 2025.In three weeks of release, “Fire and Ash” has cleared $1 billion worldwide. The third chapter in James Cameron’s Pandora epic collected $40 million over its third weekend in North American theaters, according to studio estimates Sunday.“Fire and Ash” is doing its biggest business overseas; it’s grossed $777.1 million internationally thus far. The Walt ...

item.title: Voici une balance connectée qui détecte le prédiabète et l’hypertension
item.description: Vous trouviez la première Body Scan chère ? Attendez de voir la suite. Avec la Body Scan 2, Withings pousse le bouchon encore plus loin : détection du prédiabète, suivi du stress et écran intégré à la poignée. C'est techniquement impressionnant, mais à 600 dollars, ça commence à faire cher le kilo en moins.

item.title: Pick up Amazon's latest Kindle on sale for $20 off
item.description: If you're one of the many who made a New Year's resolution to read more, an ereader can help by putting your whole library (and more) at your fingertips wherever you are. While not as expensive as an iPad or another flagship tablet, these e-paper devices can be more expensive than you think, but right now you can save on one of our favorites. Amazon's base Kindle is on sale for $90 — that's $20 less than usual and only $10 more than its record-low price. This made our list of the best ereaders, and for good reason. It's an iconic device that gets the job done. It doesn't have much by way of mo...

item.title: J. Crew’s new Olympic skiing capsule gives sportswear a ’70s vibe shift
item.description: J. Crew creative director Olympia Gayot on how the new collection was inspired by the Olympic archives, vintage design details, and winter gear with panache. J. Crew just revealed its apparel collection with the U.S. Ski & Snowboard teams for the 2026 Milan Cortina Winter Olympics. It’s an ode to retro ski aesthetics that even the most amateur athlete (or viewer) can get behind. ...

item.title: The best tech announced at CES 2026 so far
item.description: Ahead of the CES show floor officially opening on Tuesday, January 6th, many companies have already announced new tech, gadgets, concepts, and AI-powered upgrades that will be released over this year. Yesterday's CES Unveiled event delivered even more announcements and reveals. If you're already struggling to keep on top of all the news coming out […]...

item.title: CES 2026 opening night recap: All the early news you missed from Samsung and LG
item.description: CES 2026 is still a day away from officially opening, but Sunday, January 4, delivered the first real wave of news. As has become tradition, the pre-show slate set the tone for the week ahead, anchored by Samsung’s annual First Look press conference and CES Unveiled, the latter of which where hundreds of companies previewed products before the show floor opens on January 6.Samsung once again dominated the early conversation with its First Look event, using the stage to outline how it sees AI shaping everything from TVs to home appliances in the year ahead. Rather than focusing on individual sp...

item.title: Elon Musk goes all-in on SMBs with new Grok Enterprise and Business offerings
item.description: xAI has launched Business and Enterprise tiers for Grok with like-for-like pricing, but ChatGPT is still cheaper for casual users.

item.title: Apple's latest MagSafe charger is on sale for only $30
item.description:
If you want a wireless charger for your iPhone and prefer to stick with Apple, Amazon has a sale that may pique your interest. The retailer is selling the one meter Apple Magsafe charger for $30, saving you $10 off the regular price, while also selling the two meter model for $40 ($10 off).
If you have an iPhone 16, iPhone 17 or iPhone Air, this cable can charge your device at 25W as long as it's connected to a 30W power adapter on the other end. While you'll need a more recent iPhone to get the fastest MagSafe charging speeds, the charger can wirelessly top up the battery of any iPhone fro...

item.title: DJI's tiny action cam will soon get a big 8K rival from a mysterious Chinese company
item.description: A new Chinese company is set to unveil a tiny modular action camera at CES 2026, and it could rival the DJI Osmo Nano

item.title: Twelve South’s Valet is a handsome place to put your stuff
item.description: For years, the accessory maker Twelve South has sold clever accessories for charging gadgets. Its new device, the Valet, is maybe its simplest idea ever: it's a nice-looking tray designed to be the place you drop your keys, sunglasses, and other pocket detritus, and offers a couple of ways to charge whatever needs to be […]

item.title: Microsoft Edge is getting a Copilot-inspired redesign
item.description: Microsoft is preparing to launch a major UI refresh of its Edge browser soon. The software maker has started bringing the design language from Copilot to early Canary and Dev test versions of its Microsoft Edge browser. Design changes include a settings section that looks identical to the Copilot app, updated context menus, and an […]

item.title: How to watch Egypt vs. Benin online for free
item.description: How to watch AFCON for free. Live stream Egypt vs. Benin in the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations for free.

item.title: Au risque d’un nouveau clash avec Washington, Bruxelles remet la pression sur les géants américains de la tech
item.description: L'Europe n'a pas fini de jouer le rôle de poil à gratter dans la tech mondialisée et surtout américaine. Malgré les protestations des premiers intéressés et les gesticulations de la Maison Blanche, la Commission européenne a bien l'intention de poursuivre, voire d'amplifier, les enquêtes contre les mastodontes US. Au risque de provoquer l'ire de Donald Trump....

item.title: Your guide to the 2026 Winter Olympics, launching soon in Italy
item.description: The Games run from February 4–22. The countdown is on for the 2026 Winter Olympics in Italy.The torch relay is already underway and some of the top athletes are already making headlines. There are 16 sports in all, including some never seen before, and 116 gold medals are waiting to be awarded when competition begins in less than a month.This will be the most spread-out Winter Games in history: The two primary competition sites are the city of Milan and Cortina d’Ampezzo, the winter resort in the Dolomites that is more than 400 kilometers (250 miles) away by road. Athletes also will compete i...

item.title: Follow the Lego CES 2026 press conference live right here
item.description: picture alliance via Getty Images The Lego Group is set to host its very first press conference at CES 2026 later today — but exactly what it plans to unveil is still under wraps. The iconic toy brick maker has offered no clues about what's on the agenda, leaving speculation wide open, from new video games to Formula 1 race cars. Unlike nearly every other press event at CES today, however, Lego's event is not being livestreamed. Thankfully, Engadget is here to bridge the gap: Our own Nate Ingraham will be in the room at the Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas, liveblogging the event in real-time. Follo...

item.title: Fuite de données chez Ledger : le géant français des cryptos annonce un incident chez un prestataire
item.description: Ledger, le champion français de la sécurité des cryptos, est à nouveau victime d'une fuite de données. Les informations personnelles de clients ayant passé commande sur Ledger.com ont été compromises. On peut redouter une nouvelle d'arnaques... ou de tentatives d'extorsion.

item.title: A ‘Stranger Things’ Making-of Doc Hits Netflix Next Week
item.description: 'One Last Adventure: The Making of Stranger Things 5' may not answer all your burning questions, but it looks like an affectionate, emotional ride.

item.title: Mitsubishi Makes Dashcams a Dealership Add-On
item.description: The common aftermarket purchase becomes part of the carbuying process.

item.title: Lockly’s new smart locks will support Matter and NFC
item.description: Lockly has introduced a series of smart locks that have native Matter compatibility, meaning that they will be able to be used across different smart home systems. The Affirm Series of smart locks will come in both deadbolt and latch editions. What's more, the locks will support several ways to allow access, including not only […]

item.title: Google previews new Gemini features for TV at CES 2026
item.description: Google TV will let you ask Gemini to find and edit your photos, adjust your TV settings and more.

item.title: TCL launches next-gen SQD mini-LED TV at CES – the ‘best TV in the market’ for 2026
item.description: TCL launched the X11L SQD mini-LED, its flagship TV for 2026, at CES, along with a new RGB mini-LED TV and a budget mini-LED TV series.

item.title: What is the release date for Fallout season 2 episode 4 on Prime Video?
item.description: Fallout season 2's next episode will be with us shortly – here are all of the release details you need to know.

item.title: Google TV is getting Gemini-powered photo editing at CES
item.description: Google is working even more Gemini features into Google TV at CES 2026. The company demoed how the AI assistant would work on its TV platform at last year's show, and this time, it's expanding the AI's features to make it easier to do things like adjust your TV's settings or edit photos.The ability to view photos stored in Google Photos has long been a feature of Google TV, but as part of this new update, Gemini will be able to do a lot more with them, too. Google says Gemini will be able to search your Google Photos library for specific people and moments, and remix those photos into differen...

item.title: Why Saratoga Spring Water is suddenly everywhere
item.description: Backed by Primo Brands, the iconic blue bottle is being repositioned as both aspirational and accessible. If you’ve been noticing that cobalt-hued water bottles have started to pop up everywhere you’re not alone. The water has recently made an appearance on shelves at major retailers including Whole Foods and 7-Eleven, starred in viral social media videos created by fitness influencer Ashton Hall, adorned on tables at the Golden Globes, and beginning this week, will star in a fresh new advertising campaign featuring WNBA point guard Skylar Diggins....

item.title: 8BitDo is unveiling a new mobile gaming pad at CES
item.description: Gaming peripheral company 8BitDo is teasing a new smartphone gaming pad that seems aimed exclusively at portrait-mode gamers. In a post on X, the company says the 8BitDo FlipPad will debut in the summer of 2026 and will be compatible with iOS and Android devices. It also mentions the peripheral is "officially supported by Apple." The post doesn't give too much away, as the company will be premiering the FlipPad at CES this week. A short, rendered video shows that the mobile gaming peripheral connects via USB-C, and then flips upward on a hinge to lay flat against the bottom portion of a user's...

item.title: Trump’s plan to take over Venezuela’s oil industry faces major hurdles. Here’s why
item.description: Massive investment will be required to overcome an infrastructure in disrepair. President Donald Trump’s plan to take control of Venezuela’s oil industry and ask American companies to revitalize it after capturing President Nicolás Maduro in a raid isn’t likely to have a significant immediate impact on oil prices.Venezuela’s oil industry is in disrepair after years of neglect and international sanctions, so it could take years and major investments before production can increase dramatically. But some analysts are optimistic that Venezuela could double or triple its current output of about 1.1...

item.title: Just don't immerse it: Jackery reveals world's lightest kWh-capacity IP65-rated portable power station — and it can even withstand a 1m fall
item.description: The Jackery Explorer 1500 Ultra is a professional-grade portable power station offering high-capacity energy, rapid recharge, IP65 durability, and extreme environmental resilience.

item.title: AirTag deal: Get a four-pack of the Bluetooth trackers for only $65
item.description:
Apple keeps most of its product pricing on a tight leash, but we do see the company's AirTags go on sale pretty frequently. Another cost cut has come around for this item just in time for the holidays. Amazon is currently selling a four-pack of AirTags for $65. At a third off the regular cost, that price is pretty close to the record low discount of $63 we've seen for these Bluetooth trackers.
AirTags can be useful for people who travel frequently, helping you to keep track of essentials like your passport as well as a way to keep tabs on luggage while you're on the go. If you do purchase so...
